Hanyang University: Hanyang University (HYU, Korean: 한양대학교) is a private prestigious research university in Seoul and Ansan (ERICA campus), South Korea.[2] Hanyang (한양, 漢陽) derives from the former name of the capital Seoul used during the Joseon Dynasty.[3] The university was founded  in 1939 as an engineering school, and was the country's first college to offer engineering and architecture programs.
